content: I've been using Lightroom for most of my editing, and I'm pretty comfortable with it. I'm aiming for a natural look that still brings out the vibrant colors of the coast. Last Sunday, I went to the nearby park and took some photos of the flowers and trees, and I was experimenting with different apertures and shutter speeds to get some nice bokeh effects. But I think the coastal shots from the week before that are more striking - we spent three days driving along the coastal highway, stopping at all the scenic overlooks and taking in the views.
